    IController<T> - Interface in controller
    Interface for controllers in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    IControllerFactory<T> - Interface in Factory
    Interface for controller factories in Flossy.
    Income - Class in models
    Represents an income entry in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    Income(String, double, String) - Constructor for class models.Income
    Constructs a new Income with the given source, amount, and date.
    IncomeControllerFactory - Class in Factory
    Factory for creating IncomeController instances for a specific user.
    IncomeControllerFactory(User) - Constructor for class Factory.IncomeControllerFactory
    Constructs an IncomeControllerFactory for the given user.
    IncomeService - Class in service
    Service for validating and creating Income objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    IncomeService() - Constructor for class service.IncomeService
     
    IncomeStorage - Class in storage
    Storage class for Income objects for a specific user in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    IncomeStorage(UUID) - Constructor for class storage.IncomeStorage
    Constructs an IncomeStorage for the given user ID.
    IReminder - Interface in reminder
    Interface for reminders in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    isAuthenticated() - Method in class controller.UserController
    Checks if a user is currently authenticated.
    IService<T> - Interface in service
    Interface for validation services in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    isExceeded() - Method in class models.Budget
    Returns true if the spent amount exceeds the budgeted amount.
    isOneTime() - Method in class models.Budget
    Returns true if this is a one-time budget.
    isOneTime() - Method in class models.BudgetReminder
    Returns true if the associated budget is one-time.
    isOneTime() - Method in class models.PaymentReminder
    Returns true if this is a one-time reminder.
    isOneTime() - Method in interface reminder.IReminder
    Checks if the reminder is a one-time reminder.
    isRecurring() - Method in class models.Expense
    Returns whether the expense is recurring.
    isTriggered() - Method in class models.BudgetReminder
    Returns true if the associated budget is exceeded.
    isTriggered() - Method in class models.PaymentReminder
    Returns true if the reminder is triggered (today or earlier).
    isTriggered() - Method in interface reminder.IReminder
    Checks if the reminder is triggered (should notify the user).
    isValidPassword(String) - Method in class service.UserService
    Checks if the given password is valid (at least 8 characters).
